main.name: Poon Tze Jian / Nicholas
main.bio1: Zealous AI enthusiast specialising in Training and Fine-Tuning models, driving scalable Implementations, and employing STATE-OF-THE-ART methodologies to push the frontiers of AI innovation.
main.bio2: A versatile full-stack developer, proficient in diverse Software Frameworks, Tools, and Libraries. Experienced in building applications from scratch, maintaining robust systems, and deploying advanced AI models.
main.bio3: Dedicated to unraveling the complexities of language, I am a passionate linguist captivated by the convoluted meanings behind words and the nuances of pronunciation through precise enunciation.

resume.skillmessage: Some cutting techniques and methods of mine that you might find useful

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence (Hons)
education.description: In group projects, I often take the lead on model training, having successfully completed initiatives across diverse fields, including Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, and many other domains.
Accumulated knowledge through detailed lecture explanations and proactive research into unfamiliar concepts.
Possessing a profound understanding of software frameworks, libraries, and concepts gained from in-depth explanation videos and hands-on exercises.
Actively participating in classes and tests equivalent to the JLPT.

work.title: Part time Software Developer
work.description: Enhancing layouts for both web and mobile applications, utilizing Next.js and Flutter, while diligently resolving bugs and maintaining a seamless user experience across platforms.

work.title: Chinese to English Translator
work.description: Interpreting Chinese novels into American English, establishing a flair for natural linguistic flow.
